sentences.en: ABout 90 % of the waxes in commerce are recovered by dewaxing petroleum.
sentences.cn: 工业用蜡中约有90%是由石油中回收的.

sentences.en: Automotive waxes, whether natural or synthetic, are meant to be sacrificial barriers.
sentences.cn: 车蜡, 不管是天然的还是合成的, 都是牺牲品.

sentences.en: Countermeasures: join waxes cocatalyst so that the ink stick are shorter, withdrawal.
sentences.cn: 对策: 加入蜡类助剂使油墨变短 、 撤粘.

sentences.en: Don't be fooled by claims that color - matched waxes can remove scratches.
sentences.cn: 别愚蠢的跟人家说,有颜色的蜡可以去除划痕.

sentences.en: Globally mineral wax, particularly petroleum waxes forms the bulk of total supply.
sentences.cn: 全球矿物蜡, 特别是石蜡形成了大量的供给.

sentences.en: Lubricants, soaps and waxes are commonly used as softeners.
sentences.cn: 润滑剂 、 肥皂、蜡通常被用作柔软剂.

sentences.en: Natural fibres contain impurities in the form of oils, fats and waxes.
sentences.cn: 天然的纤维含有一些类似油和石蜡之类的杂质.

sentences.en: Paraffin waxes are normally marketed on the basis of a melting - point test.
sentences.cn: 石腊一般按其熔点不同在市场上分类出售.

sentences.en: She waxes righteously indignant if anyone tries to contradict her.
sentences.cn: 如果有人想反驳她,她说起话来就会义愤填膺.

sentences.en: Sirrah , by my fay , it waxes late. ( Shakespeare ).
sentences.cn: 小子, 老实说,天不早了.

sentences.en: That's a Yin Yang theory term - one aspect wanes, the other waxes.
sentences.cn: 这符合事物兴衰起伏的阴阳理论———此消彼长, 阴阳转化.

sentences.en: The moon waxes and wanes every month.
The moon waxes only to wane, brims only to overflow.
sentences.cn: 人有悲欢离合,月有阴晴圆缺.

sentences.en: The moon waxes till it becomes full, and then wanes.
sentences.cn: 月亮渐盈,直到正圆, 然后消亏.

sentences.en: The waxes are classed as alcohol or organic solvent extracted materials.
sentences.cn: 这种蜡质属于乙醇有机溶剂的萃取物.

sentences.en: There were coloured candles which had spread pools of wax on the furniture.
sentences.cn: 彩色蜡烛在家具上留下了一摊摊的蜡油。

phrases.tran_cn: 蜡模铸造；失蜡铸造；脱蜡铸造
月圆月缺；盈亏；兴衰成败

trans.tran_cn: 蜡( wax的名词复数 )，耳垢，耳屎
trans.tran_en: Wax is a solid, slightly shiny substance made of fat or oil that is used to make candles and polish. It melts when it is heated.
